author: Branch Education
description:
Ever wondered how the scroll wheel on your computer mouse actually works? 🖱️ Using 3D animation, this short dives inside the mouse to show how the scroll wheel detects movement, translates rotation into signals, and lets you smoothly scroll through pages—revealing the tiny mechanical and electronic parts that make it all feel effortless.

Watch the full video -  https://youtu.be/-HVKm5fIUA8
title: How do Scroll Wheels Work? #mouse #howitworks
